pages.text: This ritual separates a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)$(marked)Demon$() from their hellish home, using a human's soul as bait.$(br2)Demons offer a variety of trades, but they will usually attack you unless you wear $(l:bewitchment:tools/besmirched_armor)$(item)Besmirched Armor$().$(br2)If they $(o)do$() attack you, keep them away from anything burnable.
The ritual is started by sacrificing a $(marked)Villager$() or similar type of human with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$().
